type POST_PK = { S: `AUTHOR#${string}` }
type POST_SK = { S: `POST#${string}` }

export function generatePostKey(author: string, title: string): {pk: POST_PK, sk: POST_SK} {
  return {
    pk: { S: `AUHOR#${author}` },
    sk: { S: `POST#${title}` },
  }
}

// DynamoDB Entity Author
type DynamoDBAuthor = {
  name: unknown;
  nPosts: AttributeValue.NMember;
}

// DynamoDB Entity Post
type DynamoDBPost = {
  body: unknown;
  pk: POST_PK;
  publishedAt: AttributeValue.SMember;
  sk: POST_SK;
  tags?: AttributeValue.SSMember;
  title: unknown;
}

/* The above section was generated by generate-dynamodb-docs.
   If you want to make changes, edit dynamodb.yml and run

       npm run gen:docs

   to regenerate this section
*/
